definitions.definition: a person or animal's intestines or internal organs, especially when removed or exposed.
examples: intestines, bowels, guts, viscera, internal organs, vital organs; Moreoffal; informalinsides, innards "the entrails are removed by the butcher"Moreoffal; insides, innards the entrails are removed by the butcher
digging copper out of the entrails of the earth
